Frequently Asked Questions

Go Back

I haven't received or have lost my Games ID?

The Games has a duplicate at the Games ID Pick Up Desk at an Accreditation Centre. Bring a photo (face shot similar to drivers license - to go on the Games ID) and photo ID All entrants MUST have a valid Games ID. You will not be able to compete without this.
